overview: Spoof porn! Bust out of your zippers and hop on the Soooooooul Train, in the adult DVD Official Soul Train Parody! Groove on the legendary dance floor with the most bootylicious, lip-smackin', down and dirty ho's, like Melrose Foxxx and Candice Nicole! They'll be shaking, shimmying, and sliding their way down onto the biggest black rhythm sticks in XXX! If you like a little extra pump and grind in your dance moves - you know what I'm talkin' about, then do not miss this official Soul Train parody!
title: The Official Soul Train Parody
